storyInfo: Having been threatened by the Armorless Union, Nearl has no choice but to stay vigilant. Having seen Darksteel's might firsthand, Lazurite Roy finally accepts something related to Platinum's past. The infected knights stand ready to paralyze the city.

attributes.content: I was wondering why you would have that immobile Sarkaz along with you.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Now I know.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Um... Monique? I'm not sure I get it...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Then shut your mouth and stop embarrassing yourself.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: The Armorless Union, is it? What do you want?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: First things first, please allow me to apologize to the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That is, for the Armorless Union's kidnapping of your sister, Maria—
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: —Hey, hold your beasties. It wasn't my doing.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You... you wretched henchmen!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Maria should already have made it home safe. Relax. We have no more tricks to pull on you, and suppose we were going to do anything else, we would've gone for... less perfect results.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We at the Armorless Union are just doing our jobs, even if it's not exactly what we want to do. We've got eyes on us from above. You know what I mean?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You're attacking the Infected.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: That's how the bosses arranged things. Don't lay the blame on us.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The cause doesn't clear you of your crimes.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I guess you're right...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But isn't that why we're paying you a visit today?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: We have nothing to say to each other. If it is a fight you want, it is a fight you'll get.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Hey, now, let's cool our tempers, shall we? I'll be frank. We want to shake off the General Chamber of Commerce.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: We're here today to make this clear. We're on different sides. I mean, we still belong to the Chamber...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But would you be willing to sign a peace treaty with us?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: You, the Radiant Knight, the Nearl family and its subordinates, as well as this 'Rhodes Island.' I am hoping you will all refrain from getting in the way of our plans.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: In return, the Armorless Union won't interfere with your quest for glory or lay a finger on anyone that's got anything to do with you.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: What about the Infected...?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Sorry, but we can't possibly do everything either.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The Infected are a threat to us. Not to worry, though. We have a use for those Infected knights too.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: To take the fall for you?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That's not what I want, Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: —What is the Armorless Union?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Long ago, the local farmers and affinities pulled together and hired a group of veteran assassins to stand up to an indulgent knight noble.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: But they all failed—Every last one of them.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The knight hanged the traitors atop his castle, to make an example of them. The villagers in the territory could only keep their mouths shut and give up their fight.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Some time after that, however, there was an archer who took matters into his own hands. Back then, everyone figured that bows and arrows were no match for a Kuranta knight's speed, so they weren't really holding their breaths.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Yet when the cruel knight's family awoke the next morning, they found the knight impaled through the ground by a long spear, mid-charge, his head still looking up.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: When the crowd got closer, they realized it wasn't a spear at all. It was an arrow. An arrow forged by Darksteel.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: 'Darksteel,' the very first member of the Armorless Union.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I'm very well aware that we're hired killers, but nonetheless...
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Legends like these aren't always without merit.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: —Nearl! Above you!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight lifts her head.
The streets are only barely lit, and the stars on the night sky are twinkling brilliantly.
Among them, a lone shooting star twinkles a few times before straying from the rest of the meteor shower's path.
It falls straight to the ground.
—An arrow?!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Break it!
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Roger—!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: Aaah—?!
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Liz, watch out!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: (Nearl and I both struck it at the same time... and... it didn't break?)
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Are you two okay?
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: I-I'm fine... W-What was that just now?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: Margaret looks to her side in silence.
There is a pitch black arrow long as a spear burrowed into the concrete.
Impressive... I've never seen anyone react to Darksteel's shots in time, much less dodge them.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Your swordsmanship is as impressive as the rumors say, Radiant Knight. That was an eye-popping maneuver from the Confessarius, too... Luckily, the arrow's not life deadly—
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: —Is that the smell of souls, Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I never expected to see such fine swordsmanship and Arts... from a doctor like you.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Save it... So much for your peace treaty.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: I'm sure you know already, but that shot wasn't meant to take your lives. The Sarkaz sitting over there would be thoroughly dead otherwise.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So, now that we've broken the ice, please do give our proposal some thought.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I hope you understand that one shot just now, but the Armorless Union isn't begging on bended knee—
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: There are three 'Darksteels.'
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: How many of their arrows can you dodge?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Armorless Union members' figures disappear into the gap between the neon signs and the moonlight.
All that remains is the reverberating jazz music.
'Darksteel...' a metal with an obsidian-like luster. Very heavy.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It came falling down from the dark night sky... just as the name implies.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: From the... night sky?
attributes.name: Nightingale

attributes.content: The night sky...
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: The Radiant Knight looks up again.
There are twinkling stars everywhere, seemingly ready to strike down and ambush them at any moment.
This arrow... They must have shot it from far away. It was the high slope of the trajectory that made it seem like it fell from the sky.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: That makes no sense.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: The Armorless Union... and 'Darksteel.' If everything's just like the smooth-tongued guy said, they were the origins of the term 'Armorless Union.'
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: These assassins might have their eyes on our heads right this moment.
attributes.name: Margaret

attributes.content: You're right. We need to be more alert. This is Kazimierz, after all.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: It's the fortress of their crimes.
attributes.name: Shining

attributes.content: Malkiewicz...
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: What's the matter, Mr. McKee?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: It seems like you've lightened up a lot the past couple days. Did something happen?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: No... I just figured out what it is I should be doing.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Oh yes?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I heard you have a close relationship with Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals, and that you even arranged for their leader to meet with a few other corporations the other day?
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: That's true... Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: I'm sure you know, but public opinion on the Infected has been getting out of hand. We'll have to do something sooner or later.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is one of the few foreign companies that operate in Area 0, but they have the Adeptus Sprawiedliwi's support nonetheless.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: We must treat this Rhodes Island seriously. Actually, a few of the executives have already made clear that they want us to investigate... and make sure they're dealt with.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Dealt with... huh?
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: There are certain secrets about Area 0 that we can't let an outsider uncover.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: We're deploying the Armorless Union here, and the responsible party will again be given the Platinum's command.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: The Armorless Union?!
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: However... I also proposed to the Board that they put you in charge of this.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: Mr. McKee! Thank you!
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Don't mention it.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I'm hoping your relationship with Rhodes Island will keep things simple. When you do business in Kazimierz, you have to play by Kazimierz's rules.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Spokesman Malkiewicz

attributes.content: Another thing... Please make sure word doesn't get out on this whole affair, lest things turn dangerous. Even though Platinum and most of the Armorless Union are still under control.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: There remains a problem with the Armorless Union's internal affairs. A huge problem.
attributes.name: Spokesman McKee

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Spacing out again? Are you bored?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Lately, a lot of people here in the Grand Knight Territory are boycotting the Infected knights.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: If it weren't for that... Hehe... I would've loved to take a stroll around town with you.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Amiya is under a lot more pressure.

attributes.content: Well... but of course.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I find myself wondering... what is your company trying to do here in Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Closure's always complaining that we're in the red. We had to think of something.
Nearl also told us there are a lot of people here in Kazimierz who need help.
I asked her what her plan was.
I decided to give her my full support, and so did Amiya.

attributes.content: That's a pretty unsurprising answer.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Though, in the past, I would've thought it an excuse... I guess the Radiant Knight has pretty high standing at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: I can't say I've given anyone's 'standing' that much thought.;I respect Nearl, and that's got nothing to do with standing.;Margaret Nearl is one of our operators. I've never thought of her as the Radiant Knight.

attributes.content: Kazimierz companies these days like to boast about having flat management structures, but it's actually a ploy to get the bottom-rung workers to let their guard down.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: But if that's what you say, Doctor... then let's go with that.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Does this mean that if I come work part time at Rhodes Island right now, we'll be... on equal footing?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: My, I'm so jealous.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: You turned a blind eye to the Radiant Knight's title and status, treating her only as a person... and you still respect her nonetheless?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What about everyone else at Rhodes Island? Do they have your respect too? If so... I think I'm a little curious about this place now.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: There are a lot of knights who respect the Radiant Knight, though it's always for the same two reasons.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: It's either because she is a 'Nearl' or that she's 'the Radiant Knight.'
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: As a knight of Kazimierz, it's interesting to be given a different answer.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: I was sold as a slave to Kazimierz. Ever since, my master taught me to be ready to give my life for others.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Even now, I'm ready to die for you, you know? Hehe.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: Because you were tasked to be my bodyguard?;Because that's an order from the Adeptus?

attributes.content: That's how campaign knights are trained.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: That's why the Radiant Knight's actions feel somewhat distant to me.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: Do you think it's a noble thing to give your life for somebody else's ideals?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What if that person's ideal is to give their own life for somebody else? What would that get us in the end?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: As long as it's something better, I'd call that a win.

attributes.content: That's a naive way of thinking. It's nothing like how sharp you were when dealing with the K.G.C.C.
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: If you don't think I'm worthy of your sacrifice, then don't make it.

attributes.content: How could you say that? You're doubting my loyal—
attributes.name: Gravel

attributes.options: If you think I'm worthy of your sacrifice, then live on for us.
You're a brilliant knight, and you're a partner of Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: What's on your mind?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Nothing, it's just... it's been a while since I last saw Darksteel make a move.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: When was it?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: You weren't a Lazurite yet... It was when we took care of the last Platinum.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That Platinum was Centaurea's master... or something like that, I guess?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: It was raining that day. The time was 4:47 P.M., and I was just about to go on a business trip to another city.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I was the only Lazurite at the time, and I got a call all of a sudden. They told me that 'Platinum' betrayed us, and I had to take him out immediately.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: So...? Did you kill your coworker with your own two hands?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Nope. If I'd done that, I'm not sure I'd ever get a decent night's sleep again.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Actually, by the time we made it there... Haha... It was an unfinished building.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The whole third floor was wrecked, and the traitor... was nailed to the wall high above the ground with one of Darksteel's heavy arrows pierced straight through his chest.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Now, I may be an amateur when it comes to on-site investigation, but I could tell that 'Platinum' tried to run away, only to get shot through the chest by the arrow mid-air, and pinned to the wall like that.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I was standing right under the wall, and the poor guy who fell in love with his target and tried to betray us was nailed right there above me.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I can still see it in my mind. I'd never seen a wall as white as that, and he looked like he really suffered.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Only an idiot would be fooled by somebody spouting freedom and platitudes. They don't understand what it actually means to survive.
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hm... Are they finally making their move?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Pinus Sylvestris, huh...?
attributes.name: Monique

attributes.content: Right, they're very cautious... but... they couldn't hold back any longer.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: I mean, we've had those Infected boycott protests the last two days. It's ironic. I'm not even sure who's the victim here anymore.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: *Sigh*, another phone call? Does it ever stop?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Hello—
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Why didn't you position yourself at the specified coordinates?
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: The Confessarius and the Radiant Knight wouldn't have blocked that arrow.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: You had them face north, and they saw my arrow in time.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I could've killed the Sarkaz sitting on the chair at least.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Ahaha, I'm not sure what you're talking about—I can't just laugh this one off, eh?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: That was my quick thinking, Boss. The Radiant Knight's a stubborn one. If you kill one of her friends, you'll just end up provoking her.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: If she'd lose her cool, I don't see why we shouldn't have.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: That would've been too dangerous, Boss. Sorry for only cluing you in after the fact, but I think the threat level we're at is just right. Let's not overdo it.
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: Trust me. The Radiant Knight won't get in your way... By the way, may I ask how things are going right now?
attributes.name: Roy

attributes.content: The Board will figure this out soon... but no matter. When the city is paralyzed by the Infected...
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: I will end the last of the insiders, personally.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: And then no one alive will know the identities of the Armorless Union's highest ranking members.
attributes.name: A Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: In position.
attributes.name: Justyna

attributes.content: Loud and clear.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: All ready.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Yeah! We can do this!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Sona... The backup power's kicking in way too fast. They might have improved their emergency measures.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Please... Please be careful.
attributes.name: Greynuty

attributes.content: Hah, so you're saying I should put on an even bigger show?
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: That's right, Wild Mane! Bash those Armorless Union bastards' brains in!
attributes.name: An Infected Knight

attributes.content: Of course! I'm ready, anytime!
attributes.name: Iwona

attributes.content: Iwona will ambush the Armorless Union's patrol head on.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: After half an hour, Ashley will ambush the supply sector. If we don't run into any surprises, the Adeptus's guards will be 'sent away' at that point.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I'll infiltrate the K.G.C.C. and take what we need. Easy peasy.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Okay... Let's get this started.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: I can help you sneak into the building...
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: But that's all I can do for you. You'll also need somebody to keep your escape route clear.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: That's more than enough. Thanks, Toland.
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Don't forget what I said. What you folks are doing means much more than you can ever imagine.
attributes.name: Toland

attributes.content: Now, let everyone see this city cry its eyes out.
attributes.name: Toland
